features.name: Syntax Highlighting
features.description: Advanced syntax highlighting for multiple programming languages

features.name: Tab-based Interface
features.description: Chrome-like tabs for multiple file editing

features.name: Line Numbering

features.description: Automatic backup every minute with configurable interval
